alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:51AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... South River at GA 81 at Snapping Shoals affecting Henry, Butts and Newton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South River at GA 81 at Snapping Shoals. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 81. Much further downstream...portions of Lucy Lane and Lunsford Road in north Butts County begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM EST Wednesday was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.7 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued at 300 PM EST.this evening at 600 PM EST.
